article.description: Karl Charles scored 15 with seven rebounds and Matt Zignorski had 13 points to help Holy Cross beat Sacred Heart 69-60 Wednesday.
article.headline: Charles leads Holy Cross to 69-60 win over Sacred Heart
article.linkText: Charles leads Holy Cross to 69-60 win over Sacred Heart
article.story: WORCESTER, Mass. -- Karl Charles scored 15 with seven rebounds and Matt Zignorski had 13 points to help Holy Cross beat Sacred Heart 69-60 Wednesday. Malachi Alexander finished with 13 points while Anthony Thompson and Cullen Hamilton scored 10 apiece for Holy Cross (2-3). Sean Hoehn hit a 3-pointer to pull Sacred Heart (1-4) within three, 60-57, with 4:16 to play but the Pioneers made just 1 of 5 field goals with three turnovers from there. Neither team shot even 40 percent from the field (Sacred Heart made 21 of 53 shots while Holy Cross hit 21 of 54). The Crusaders forced 14 Sacred Heart turnovers -- while committing just seven -- and made more free throws (19) than the Pioneers attempted (14) while shooting 70.4 percent from the stripe. Tevin Falzon scored 21 with seven rebounds and Cane Broome had 19 points, including four 3-pointers, for Sacred Heart.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
